Card Holds∵

A CardHold is a type of authorization that reserves a dollar amount on a credit card to be captured (debited) at a later date, usually within 7 days.


Available Query Filters
amount

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=, in, !in

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

expires_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

is_void

Available Operations: =, !=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

transaction_number

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

Create a New Card Hold∵

Creates a hold on a card.

amount
required integer. Amount in cents for this card_hold
description
optional string. A description of the hold, used for display purposes.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id/card_holds

Balanced::Card.hold

balanced.Card().hold()

balanced.get().hold()

CardHold(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Card->card_holds->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4skRAbUHQztPehJn5oPfzN/card_holds \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC72u3c6W1c67gNEnrMGHc7Y')
card.hold(
  :amount => 5000,
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC5nCSU0yFp3qxR4p6UZST7y')
card_hold = card.hold(
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4skRAbUHQztPehJn5oPfzN').hold({
    "amount": 5000, 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Card card = new Card("/cards/CC3ZsWHP2jMgvFrrzDzfZS0q");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");

try {
    CardHold cardHold = card.hold(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC2Xqq2tBl0B3AJgrHVngPQO");
$card->card_holds->create(array(
    "amount" => "5000",
    "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
));

?>

Example Response

{
    "card_holds": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:20.558455Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard", 
            "expires_at": "2014-04-03T16:12:20.699710Z", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku", 
            "id": "HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku", 
            "links": {
                "card": "CC4skRAbUHQztPehJn5oPfzN", 
                "debit": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "HL959-512-3616", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:20.844213Z", 
            "voided_at": null
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "card_holds.card": "/cards/{card_holds.card}", 
        "card_holds.debit": "/debits/{card_holds.debit}", 
        "card_holds.debits": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/debits", 
        "card_holds.events": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/events"
    }
}

Fetch a Card Hold∵

Fetches the details of a previously created CardHold.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/:card_hold_id

Balanced::CardHold.fetch

balanced.CardHold.fetch()

balanced.get()

CardHold(String uri)

Balanced\CardHold::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card_hold = Balanced::CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL73rLlJ9e9d0jCowQ1BZUSP')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card_hold = balanced.CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL5wAfv8JaMsEn9idXrLZZZT')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

CardHold cardHold = new CardHold("/card_holds/HL4a1BKhDiVV9Ueh9MTozVDs");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\CardHold::get("/card_holds/HL2ZjCXw7QFFwhZFEzku161c");

?>

            "links": {

                "debit": null
            }, 
            "meta": {}, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "HL959-512-3616", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:20.844213Z", 
            "voided_at": null
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "card_holds.card": "/cards/{card_holds.card}", 
        "card_holds.debit": "/debits/{card_holds.debit}", 
        "card_holds.debits": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/debits", 
        "card_holds.events": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/events"
    }
}

List all Card Holds∵

Returns a list of all previously created CardHold resources. The holds are returned in sorted order, with the most recent holds appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds

Balanced::CardHold.all

balanced.CardHold.query

balanced.marketplace.card_holds

CardHold.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->card_holds

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

holds = Balanced::CardHold.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card_holds = balanced.CardHold.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.card_holds

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

CardHold.Collection holds = new CardHold.Collection(CardHold.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$marketplace->card_holds->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

Update a Card Hold∵

Updates information on a previously created CardHold.

description
optional string. A description of the hold, used for display purposes.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/:card_hold_id

Balanced::CardHold.save

balanced.CardHold().save()

balanced.get().save()

CardHold().save()

Balanced\CardHold->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=update this description" \
     -d "meta[holding.for]=user1" \
     -d "meta[meaningful.key]=some.value"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card_hold = Balanced::CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL73rLlJ9e9d0jCowQ1BZUSP')
card_hold.description = 'update this description'
card_hold.meta = {
    'holding.for' => 'user1',
    'meaningful.key' => 'some.value'
}
card_hold.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card_hold = balanced.CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL5wAfv8JaMsEn9idXrLZZZT')
card_hold.description = 'update this description'
card_hold.meta = {
  'holding.for': 'user1',
  'meaningful.key': 'some.value',
}
card_hold.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku').set('meta.something', 'useful').save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

CardHold cardHold = new CardHold("/card_holds/HL4a1BKhDiVV9Ueh9MTozVDs");
cardHold.description = "update this description";
try {
    cardHold.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$hold = Balanced\Hold::get("/card_holds/HL2ZjCXw7QFFwhZFEzku161c");
$hold->description = 'update this description';
$hold->meta = array(
    "holding.for" => "user1",
    "meaningful.key" => "some.value",
);
$hold->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "card_holds": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:20.558455Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "update this description", 
            "expires_at": "2014-04-03T16:12:20.699710Z", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku", 
            "id": "HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku", 
            "links": {
                "card": "CC4skRAbUHQztPehJn5oPfzN", 
                "debit": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "holding.for": "user1", 
                "meaningful.key": "some.value"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "HL959-512-3616", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:24.736271Z", 
            "voided_at": null
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "card_holds.card": "/cards/{card_holds.card}", 
        "card_holds.debit": "/debits/{card_holds.debit}", 
        "card_holds.debits": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/debits", 
        "card_holds.events": "/card_holds/{card_holds.id}/events"
    }
}

Capture a Card Hold∵

Captures a previously created CardHold. This creates a debit. Any amount up to the amount of the hold may be captured.

amount
optional integer. The amount of the debit in cents.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~=\'" ^`|)

Any other characters will be rejected. Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string. Free-text description of the debit for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
order
optional string. The order this debit is associated with
source
optional string. The funding instrument debited

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/:card_hold_id/debits

Balanced::CardHold.capture

balanced.CardHold().capture()

balanced.get().capture()

CardHold().capture(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\CardHold->capture();

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku/debits \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=ShowsUpOnStmt" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card_hold = Balanced::CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL73rLlJ9e9d0jCowQ1BZUSP')
debit = card_hold.capture(
  :appears_on_statement_as => 'ShowsUpOnStmt',
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card_hold = balanced.CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL5wAfv8JaMsEn9idXrLZZZT')
debit = card_hold.capture(
  appears_on_statement_as='ShowsUpOnStmt',
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/card_holds/HL4tohW3JdwMdiFjfUN0T2ku/debits').capture({
    "appears_on_statement_as": "ShowsUpOnStmt", 
    "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

CardHold cardHold = new CardHold("/card_holds/HL4a1BKhDiVV9Ueh9MTozVDs");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 1000);
payload.put("description", "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard");
payload.put("appears_on_statement_as", "ShowsUpOnStmt");

try {
    cardHold.capture(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$hold = Balanced\CardHold::get("/card_holds/HL2ZjCXw7QFFwhZFEzku161c");
$hold->capture();

?>

Example Response

{
    "debits": [
        {
            "amount": 5000, 
            "appears_on_statement_as": "BAL*ShowsUpOnStmt", 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:25.907519Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/debits/WD4zp5aS1foFjwmLy6ldnEBo", 
            "id": "WD4zp5aS1foFjwmLy6ldnEBo", 
            "links": {
                "customer": "CU3PEXLQQMkegXKvKc9wptpS", 
                "dispute": null, 
                "order": null, 
                "source": "CC4skRAbUHQztPehJn5oPfzN"
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "holding.for": "user1", 
                "meaningful.key": "some.value"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "W806-440-1364", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:12:26.703003Z"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {
        "debits.customer": "/customers/{debits.customer}", 
        "debits.dispute": "/disputes/{debits.dispute}", 
        "debits.events": "/debits/{debits.id}/events", 
        "debits.order": "/orders/{debits.order}", 
        "debits.refunds": "/debits/{debits.id}/refunds", 
        "debits.source": "/resources/{debits.source}"
    }
}

Void a Card Hold∵

Cancels the hold. Once voided, the hold can no longer be captured.

description
optional string. A description of the hold, used for display purposes.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/:card_hold_id

Balanced::CardHold.void

balanced.CardHold().cancel()

balanced.get().void()

CardHold().unstore()

Balanced\CardHold->void()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/card_holds/HL4BKPJ05RNQrsvC6VS1FfGG \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "is_void=true"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card_hold = Balanced::CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL7bTcFBCjdbuf5K5U74XxWU')
card_hold.void

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card_hold = balanced.CardHold.fetch('/card_holds/HL5Ig892KbmJyDqED5fYsJ8m')
card_hold.cancel()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');
